### Invitation to Tender: Propane Units Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), hereby invites firms to submit their responses to a Request for Standing Offer for Propane Units Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul Services.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4097666480
* **Publication Date**: July 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 7, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2024

The Request for Standing Offer is for the provision of Propane Units Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul Services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at various locations of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax.

#### Tender Submission Requirements

All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, Kate Mintzer, via email at [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Inquiries must be made in writing and received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for response.

#### Terms and Conditions

The Standing Offer will be established for a period of 12 months, with the option to renew for two additional 1-year periods. The bidder with the lowest price will be selected. 

#### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents, including instructions for submissions and evaluation criteria, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS). The notice URL is [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16864921?extsite=MTY4NjQ5MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16864921?extsite=MTY4NjQ5MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

For more information about the solicitation, please consult the tender description.
